item.title: Open Google Drive and Google Calendar as a specific user
item.description: Quick tip: did you know you can open Google Drive, Google Calendar and more as a specific user? Just add ?authuser= and your URL encoded email address behind the address. For example, https://drive.google.com/?authuser=merlijn.sebrechts%40gmail.com opens Google Drive as user merlijn.sebrechts@gmail.com. https://calendar.google.com/?authuser=merlijn.sebrechts%40ugent.be opens Google Calendar as user merlijn.sebrechts@ugent.be. This works with almost every google website, including gmail. Note: you can use an online tool to URL encode your email address.
